Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides for the financing and construction of facilities for Village of Lake Placid, Inc. by the dormitory authority
Summary: Provides for the financing and construction of facilities for Village of Lake Placid, Inc. by the dormitory authority.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing for the financing and construction of facilities for Village of Lake Placid, Inc.
